title: Establish WiFi connection between PC and E5336Bs-2&Bs-6
answer:
A: Please follow these steps to set up your WLAN 

 1. Enable your wireless network card and double click![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=31507)icon displayed on windows start bar to open “Choose a wireless network” dialog 

 2. Select SSID of E5336Bs-2&Bs-6 in the local wireless device list (The WiFi Key and the SSID can be found on a label stick inside the back cover), click ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=31508) to connect. 

                   ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=31509)


 3.Input WiFi Key in the dialog of password input then click![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=31510)to establish connection **please pay attention to the case sensitive of WiFi passwords.** 

 **![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=31511)** 

 **![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=31512)** 

4.After the icon of wireless network card turned from ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=31514)(status of acquiring IP address ) into ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=31515),your PC has established WiFi connection with E5336Bs-2&Bs-6 successfully, enter [http://192.168.8.1](http://192.168.8.1/) in web browser (ex. IE) to visit Web UI(Double click the web browser and the Web UI will open too).
